token.{INTRO2}: Welcome to the "Consensus Under a Deadline" game!
token.{INTRO4}: Reaching a unanimous decision of one chosen option.
token.{INTRO5}: In every game, every user gets a set of animals ranked by their score, and chooses the highest ranked animal automatically.
token.{INTRO6}: If all the players choose the same animal before the end of the game, every player will receive the score that shows below the chosen animal.
token.{INTRO7}: The score doesn't depend on the time it takes to reach the decision - if there won't be a unanimous derision, no one will get their points .
token.{INTRO8}: In every round, every player can ask to change their selection, but pay attention - only one players request will be granted.
token.{INTRO9}: Every 200 gained point equals to 1 bonus point. Each player can play 15 games at most, or until he reach the maximum of 1000 points.
token.{INTRO10}: The first 2 games are introduction games, which are not counted.
token.{AGREE}: My participation in the game is an agreement to participate in the research
token.{WARNING}: No Unanimous Decision By the Deadline - No Points!
token.{NO_AGREEMENT}: Game finished with no agreement! , Your score: 0
token.{WAIT_FOR_OTHER}: Please wait for the other player's response..
token.{NO_ONE_CHANGE}: No one has changed their selection
token.{WANT_TO_CHANGE}: Would you like to change your selection?
token.{GAME_INACTIVE}: Game inactive, please try again later
token.{NO_GAMES}: No more games!, please try later
token.{AGREEMENT}: We have an agreement! , Your score:
token.{WAIT_FOR_GAME}: , Please wait for the game to start.
token.{GAME_OFF}: The game was deactivated by the administrator
token.{PENDING_GAME_OFF}: The pending game was cancelled by the administrator, please try to login again.
token.{GAMES_LIMIT}: You have reached your games limit
token.{INTRO_GAME}: This is an introduction game, points will not be counted
